title: The Colbert Rapport
description: When is it appropriate to request a photo with a celebrity seen in the wild? Andrew and Britt bring this case of a Hollywood party, Stephen Colbert, and potential Facebook popularity before the judge.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
